Returns: The name of the local endpoint.
getLocalEndpointName().Description: Retrieves the human readable name for the local endpoint being advertised (possibly after resolving name collisions.)

ClassDesc: Result delivered when a local endpoint starts being advertised. Possible status codes include: @B_com#google#android#gms#nearby#connection#ConnectionsStatusCodes#STATUS_OK_E@ if advertising started successfully. @B_com#google#android#gms#nearby#connection#ConnectionsStatusCodes#STATUS_NETWORK_NOT_CONNECTED_E@ if the device is not connected to a network. @B_com#google#android#gms#nearby#connection#ConnectionsStatusCodes#STATUS_ALREADY_ADVERTISING_E@ if the app is already advertising itself. @B_com#google#android#gms#nearby#connection#ConnectionsStatusCodes#STATUS_ERROR_E@ if an unknown error occurred while advertising the app.
